関連科目: Students can learn all of the material with no prior background in finance, accounting, or Excel.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover, among other topics, start-up and young businesses and their critical finance decisions, equity markets, debt markets, Modern Finance, investment banking, asset management, and finance and capital markets career opportunities.
授業方法:
Hands-on practice (on paper/spreadsheets), class discussions, readings, case studies, videos, podcasts, real-life examples, and Power Point lecture slides
Hy-Flex (We meet in a classroom and provide this course "Face-to Face" as well as in "Zoom.")
